H3.text: when is the last time the us lost the olympics. 2018 Pyeongchang

A4.text: The United States had its least successful showing at a Winter Olympics since the 1998 Nagano Games, ranking fourth in both the gold and total medal count with 9 and 23 medals, respectively.

A5.text: The United States ranked fourth in both the gold and total medal count at the 2018 Winter Olympics.
